name: Toy Box (CroissantToes, Schnerby, InkyNightSky, Gismo070)
description:
This is a vertical slice demo.

Toys were built for one thing and one thing only. No, not playing! Fighting!!!

Welcome to Canvas City, where toy combat has taken the town by storm. Collect 8 unique toys to battle the neighborhood kids in thrilling, 2v2, turn-based toy battles! Earn bottlecaps to spend at the store and expand your collection. Become the toy champion of Canvas City!

Credits

  • Jessica Blask - UI artist/designer, animator
  • Rachel Fuller - 2D environment artist
  • Schnerby Jacquet - Character designer
  • Emilie Montgomery - Concept artist, toy designer, shop & dialogue programmer, writer
  • Jimmie Floyd - 3D environment artist
  • Chris Santos - Level designer, inventory & battle UI/systems programmer
  • Alexis Reedy - Menu programmer
  • Juan Valderrama - General programmer
